titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [Ende Juli / Anfang August 1925]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 120; deutsch: Briefe, S. 151; Cambridge Letters, S. 213; WiC, S. 156).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks so much for your letter. I will come to London on the 16th at 10h 40 in the evening (via Boulogne-Folkstone) Please let me meet you in London as I don't like the idea of traveling about in England alone now. If you will send me some money for the journey I shall be very glad. I'm awfully curious how we are going to get on with one another. I[t] will be exactly like a dream.
